Delivery Services

Welcome to TheFruitBox.co Delivery Information!

We're dedicated to bringing you the freshest fruits right to your doorstep. Here's everything you need to know about our delivery services:

1. Shipping Methods
- Local Delivery: We offer same-day delivery for local orders placed before 12 PM.
- Nationwide Shipping: For customers outside our local area, we ship via trusted couriers with options for standard (3-5 business days) and expedited shipping (1-2 business days).

2. Shipping Costs
- Enjoy FREE local delivery on orders over $50!
- Nationwide shipping is calculated based on the weight of your order and the shipping distance, with rates starting at $5.99.

3. Order Processing
- Orders are typically processed within 24 hours. Any orders placed during the weekend will be processed the next business day.

4. Tracking Your Order
- Once your order is dispatched, you will receive a tracking number via email so you can follow your fruit box journey to your doorstep.

5. Delivery Locations
- We currently deliver across the continental United States. Please note that we do not deliver to P.O. boxes or military bases.

6. Packaging
- Our fruit boxes are packed with care, using sustainable materials to ensure your fruit arrives fresh and undamaged.

7. Return Policy
- Due to the perishable nature of our products, we cannot accept returns. However, if you're not satisfied with your delivery, please contact us within 24 hours of receipt for a replacement or refund.

8. Customer Service
- Have questions or need assistance? Our friendly support team is here to help! Contact us at support@thefruitbox.co or call (123) 456-7890.

FAQs
- Check out our [FAQs page](#) for more details on how to manage your order, payment options, and what to do if you're not home during delivery.

Thank you for choosing TheFruitBox.co! We look forward to serving you fresh, delicious fruit straight to your door.
